definitions.definition: The outside boundary , parts or surface of something.
examples: The suburbs are a city's periphery .

definitions.definition: A first-rank administrative division of Greece , subdivided into provinces .
The more anomalous and infrequent aspects of a language, as opposed to the frequent and regular core aspects.

main_definition: The outside boundary , parts or surface of something.
secondary_definitions: A first-rank administrative division of Greece , subdivided into provinces .
( grammar , linguistics ) The more anomalous and infrequent aspects of a language, as opposed to the frequent and regular core aspects.
